mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (member_id, login_id, password, nickname, gender, birthdate) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{birthdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT count(login_id) FROM MEMBER WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT count(nickname) FROM MEMBER WHERE nickname = #{nickname} AND deleted_at IS NULL
